languages.text: {n}Гордей бережно вынимает из сумы книгу или альбом в самодельной кожаной обложке. И страницы, и переплет изрядно потрепаны.{/n} "Вот. Вот вещь, которая меня погубила. Это — оригинальный буклет "Замысел Девейна", один из тысяч, отпечатанных века назад во время строительства Футфола".

{n}Gordei pulls what looks like a book or an album with a home-made leather cover out of his bag. Both the pages and the binding look well-worn.{/n} "Here it is. My undoing. This is an authentic booklet titled Dewain's Design, one of the thousands that were printed centuries ago, in the times of Footfall's construction."
languages.original_text: {n}Гордей бережно вынимает из сумы книгу или альбом в самодельной кожаной обложке. И страницы, и переплет изрядно потрепаны.{/n} "Вот. Вот вещь, которая меня погубила. Это — оригинальный буклет "Замысел Девейна", один из тысяч, отпечатанных века назад во время строительства Футфола".

This is an authentic booklet titled Dewain's Design, one of the thousand that were printed centuries ago, in the times of Footfall's construction."

This is an authentic booklet titled Dewain's Design, one of the thousands that were printed centuries ago, in the times of Footfall's construction."

languages.text: {n}ゴーディはバッグから手作りの革表紙の本かアルバムのようなものを取り出した。ページも装丁も年季が入っている。{/n}「これです。これが私の破滅の元凶です。『ドウェインのデザイン』と題された本物の小冊子で、何世紀も前、フットフォールが建設された時代に印刷された何千冊ものうちの1冊なのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei pulls what looks like a book or an album with a home-made leather cover out of his bag. Both the pages and the binding look well-worn.{/n} "Here it is. My undoing. This is an authentic booklet titled Dewain's Design, one of the thousands that were printed centuries ago, in the times of Footfall's construction."

traits.locale_text: {n}ゴーディはバッグから手作りの革表紙の本かアルバムのようなものを取り出した。ページも装丁も年季が入っている。{/n}「これです。これが私の破滅の元凶です。『ドウェインのデザイン』と題された本物の小冊子で、何世紀も前、フットフォールが建設された時代に印刷された何千冊ものうちの1冊なのです」

languages.text: {n}戈尔代从包里掏出了一件东西，看起来像是书或相册，上面带着自制的皮革封面，书页和装订看起来都很破旧。{/n}“就是它，就是它让我沦落至此。这本小册子是本真迹，名为《德维恩的设计》。几百年前，落脚港正处于蓬勃建设时期，他们印了几千本这样的小册子。”
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei pulls what looks like a book or an album with a home-made leather cover out of his bag. Both the pages and the binding look well-worn.{/n} "Here it is. My undoing. This is an authentic booklet titled Dewain's Design, one of the thousands that were printed centuries ago, in the times of Footfall's construction."

traits.locale_text: {n}戈尔代从包里掏出了一件东西，看起来像是书或相册，上面带着自制的皮革封面，书页和装订看起来都很破旧。{/n}“就是它，就是它让我沦落至此。这本小册子是本真迹，名为《德维恩的设计》。几百年前，落脚港正处于蓬勃建设时期，他们印了几千本这样的小册子。”

languages.text: {n}Gordei saca de su mochila lo que parece un libro o un álbum con una cubierta de cuero casera. Tanto las páginas como la encuadernación parecen muy desgastadas.{/n} «Aquí está mi bien más preciado. Se trata de un libreto original que se titula "El diseño de Dewain", uno de los tantos que se imprimieron hace cientos de años, cuando Paso aún se estaba construyendo».
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei pulls what looks like a book or an album with a home-made leather cover out of his bag. Both the pages and the binding look well-worn.{/n} "Here it is. My undoing. This is an authentic booklet titled Dewain's Design, one of the thousands that were printed centuries ago, in the times of Footfall's construction."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordei saca de su mochila lo que parece un libro o un álbum con una cubierta de cuero casera. Tanto las páginas como la encuadernación parecen muy desgastadas.{/n} «Aquí está mi bien más preciado. Se trata de un libreto original que se titula "El diseño de Dewain", uno de los tantos que se imprimieron hace cientos de años, cuando Paso aún se estaba construyendo».

languages.text: {n}Gordei sort de son sac une sorte de livret à la couverture de cuir rudimentaire, dont les pages et la reliure semblent usées.{/n} « Voilà ce qui a causé ma perte. Il s'agit d'un opuscule authentique intitulé "Le plan de Dewain", l'un des milliers d'exemplaires imprimés il y a plusieurs siècles, à l'époque de la construction de Castel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei pulls what looks like a book or an album with a home-made leather cover out of his bag. Both the pages and the binding look well-worn.{/n} "Here it is. My undoing. This is an authentic booklet titled Dewain's Design, one of the thousands that were printed centuries ago, in the times of Footfall's construction."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordei sort de son sac une sorte de livret à la couverture de cuir rudimentaire, dont les pages et la reliure semblent usées.{/n} « Voilà ce qui a causé ma perte. Il s'agit d'un opuscule authentique intitulé "Le plan de Dewain", l'un des milliers d'exemplaires imprimés il y a plusieurs siècles, à l'époque de la construction de Castel. »

languages.text: {n}Gordei zieht ein Buch oder Album mit selbst gefertigtem Ledereinband aus seiner Tasche. Seiten und Bindung wirken abgenutzt.{/n} "Hier ist er. Mein Untergang. Dieses authentische Büchlein heißt 'Dewains Vorhaben' und ist eines von Tausenden Exemplaren, die vor Jahrhunderten gedruckt wurden, zur Zeit der Erbauung von Footfall."
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei pulls what looks like a book or an album with a home-made leather cover out of his bag. Both the pages and the binding look well-worn.{/n} "Here it is. My undoing. This is an authentic booklet titled Dewain's Design, one of the thousands that were printed centuries ago, in the times of Footfall's construction."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordei zieht ein Buch oder Album mit selbst gefertigtem Ledereinband aus seiner Tasche. Seiten und Bindung wirken abgenutzt.{/n} "Hier ist er. Mein Untergang. Dieses authentische Büchlein heißt 'Dewains Vorhaben' und ist eines von Tausenden Exemplaren, die vor Jahrhunderten gedruckt wurden, zur Zeit der Erbauung von Footfall."

languages.text: {n}Gordei, çantasından kitaba veya albüme benzeyen bir şey çıkarıyor. Üzeri, el yapımı deri bir kapakla kaplanmış. Sayfaları ve cildi iyiden iyiye yıpranmış duruyor.{/n} "İşte bu. Beni mahveden şey. Dewain'in Tasarımı adında hakiki bir kitapçık. Yüzlerce yıl önce, Binliman'ın inşa edildiği zamanlarda basılan binlerce kitapçıktan biri."
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei pulls what looks like a book or an album with a home-made leather cover out of his bag. Both the pages and the binding look well-worn.{/n} "Here it is. My undoing. This is an authentic booklet titled Dewain's Design, one of the thousands that were printed centuries ago, in the times of Footfall's construction."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordei, çantasından bir tür kitap veya albüme benzeyen bir şey çıkarıyor. Üzeri, ev yapımı bir deri ciltle kaplanmış. Sayfaları ve cildi, iyice yıpranmış duruyor.{/n} "İşte bu. Başımın belası. Dewain'in Tasarımı adındaki otantik bir kitapçık. Yüzlerce yıl önce, Binliman'ın inşa edildiği zamanlarda basılan binlerce kitapçıktan biri."
